crime.name: Broken getaway car
crime.descr: Remove all birds in your zone with a level less than 0. Earn $1 for each bird removed.

crime.name: Negotiate
crime.descr: Remove any "Hostage Bird" from your zone. If you do, earn $2 for each and you can add a bird from your deck that is level 0 or lower.

crime.name: Officer Bird
crime.descr: Once per turn, you can cancel the activation a negative level card.

crime.name: Good bird
crime.descr: When hired, remove any "Bad Bird" you control. While you control this bird, the cost of birds in your zone with a negative level become 0.

crime.name: Bad bird
crime.descr: When hired, remove any "Good Bird" you control. When hired, also remove any birds with a level 0 or below on the field and you earn $2 for each bird removed.

crime.name: Hostage Bird
crime.descr: Any birds adjacent to this bird are treated as level 0.

crime.name: Bandit Bird
crime.descr: During main phase, you can steal $1 from a random player (including yourself).

crime.name: Sabotage Bird
crime.descr: During end phase, you can move this bird to another zone on the field.

crime.name: An inside job
crime.descr: Place face-down. You can flip this card, remove it, and move another player's bird to your zone for the rest of the turn.

crime.name: Put the money in the bag!
crime.descr: Place face-down. If removed or flipped by another player, you steal $2 from that player for each bird in their zone.

crime.name: Defect
crime.descr: Move a bird you control to another player's zone until the start of your next main phase.

crime.name: Switchblade
crime.descr: If you control a "Bandit Bird", remove 1 bird on the field.

casual.name: Undo
casual.descr: Remove a card in your zone.

casual.name: Number 2 pencil
casual.descr: Earn $1 for every bird in your zone.

casual.name: Downsize
casual.descr: Remove all face-down cards in a player's zone.

casual.name: Coffee pot refill
casual.descr: Return a bird on the field to the hand of whoever hired it.

casual.name: Basic Bird
casual.flavor: This bird just started it's career

casual.name: Night Shift Bird
casual.descr: During main phase, you can remove this bird to draw 1 card.

casual.name: Intern Bird
casual.descr: When removed, you can return this bird to your hand.
casual.flavor: A bird that just can't get enough experience

casual.name: Evaluation
casual.descr: Place face down. When flipped, earn money equal to the level of your zone and return this card to your hand.

casual.name: Cubicle
casual.descr: During pay phase, earn $1 for each adjacent bird.

casual.name: Lucky  break
casual.descr: If a player wants to remove one or more cards in your zone or hand. Cancel the removal of one of those cards.

casual.name: Second interview
casual.descr: If a player hires a bird, flip it face-down before any effects it has activates. It cannot be flipped face-up for the rest of the turn.

casual.name: Dismissal
casual.descr: Remove any level 0 or level 1 bird on the field.

airplane.name: Promotion
airplane.descr: You can remove 1 "Crew Bird" you control to add a "Passenger Bird", "Co-pilot Bird", or "Sky Bird" to your hand.

airplane.name: Captain Bird
airplane.descr: If a "Crew Bird" is ever removed from your zone, you can add it to your hand.

airplane.name: Passenger Bird
airplane.descr: If this bird is removed, lose $2. During main phase, you can hire 1 additional bird.

airplane.name: Co-pilot Bird
airplane.descr: If this bird is removed, lose $2. During main phase, you can remove 1 "Crew Bird" from your zone to remove 1 card from the field.

airplane.name: Sky Bird
airplane.descr: During main phase, you can remove 1 "Crew Bird" from your zone to add a quick action card from your discard pile to your hand.

airplane.name: Crew Bird
airplane.descr: If this bird is removed, lose $2.

airplane.name: Great Airport
airplane.descr: You can only control 1 "Great Airport". During main phase, you can earn $1 for each "Crew Bird", "Passenger Bird", "Sky Bird", and "Co-pilot Bird" you control.

airplane.name: Crash landing
airplane.descr: Remove all "Crew Bird" you control and earn $3 for each one.

airplane.name: Fast-track
airplane.descr: Remove 1 "Crew Bird" you control to hire a "Co-pilot Bird" or "Passenger Bird" from your discard pile or hand.
